FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #49 Western Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/Thomas
ShortDescription: Northbound 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Augusta, California, Division and Western due to street blockage near Western/Thomas.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Augusta, California, Division and Western due to street blockage near Western/Thomas.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
